name: Sisterhood eyebrow plucking & shaping saloon: "just like Kourtney"
name_original: Sisterhood eyebrow plucking & shaping saloon: "just like Kourtney"
description:
Have you ever wanted to be an eyebrow specialist? Well now you can be with this game! Create endless make up combinations with the touch of your finger.

- pluck the unwanted hair with the touch of your plucker!
- Change hair styles
- Add piercings
- 1,000's of different combinations possible

*Please note that this game may require you to purchase game items with real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases.*

Heres your chance to create the style that you want on your favourite celebs!
